titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the making vp of girdles, belts, hangers, and other vvares for mens wearing, or for vvarre-seruice, with brasse-buckles.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVhitehall the twelfth day of Ianuary, in the eighth yeere of the reigne of our soueraigne lord, Charles ..
Imprint from colophon; the imprint year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 24; Steele notation: Com- uings, 2) Iron de-.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
